actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish programs regarding early detection, diagnosis, and interventions for newborns and infants with hearing loss.
short_title: Early Hearing Loss Detection, Diagnosis, and Intervention Act of 1998
subjects: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Early Hearing Loss Detection, Diagnosis, and Intervention Act of 1998 - Mandates grants or cooperative agreements to: (1) develop statewide hearing loss early detection, diagnosis, and intervention networks; and (2) provide technical assistance to State agencies to complement an intramural program and to conduct applied research related to infant hearing detection, diagnosis, and treatment or intervention. Requires the National Institutes of Health to carry out research on the efficacy of new screening techniques and technology. Mandates coordination and collaboration. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Early Hearing Loss Detection, Diagnosis, and Intervention Act of 1998
A bill to establish programs regarding early detection, diagnosis, and interventions for newborns and infants with hearing loss.
